description:
The Dialog mixin is intended for all components
that extend <k-dialog> It forwards the methods to
the <k-dialog> ref. Extending <k-dialog> directly
can lead to breaking methods when the methods are not
wired correctly to the right elements and refs.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether to disable the submit button

props.name: icon
props.description: The icon type for the submit button

props.name: theme
props.description: The theme of the submit button

events.name: submit
events.description: The submit button is clicked or the form is submitted.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Triggers the `@cancel` event and closes the dialog.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Triggers the `@close` event and closes the dialog.

methods.name: focus
methods.description:
Sets the focus on the first usable input
or a given input by name

methods.name: open
methods.description:
Opens the dialog and triggers the `@open` event.
Use ready to fire events that should be run as
soon as the dialog is open
